text.div:
Patient Gender

Gender of the patient as indicated on the event record. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/gndr_cd

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gndr-cd defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
Blank UnknownUnknown
1 MaleMale
2 FemaleFemale

name: Patient Gender
title: Patient Gender
description: Gender of the patient as indicated on the event record. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/gndr_cd
